```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
library(fs)
```

```{r}
sheets_deauth()

beads <- read_sheet(ss = "14HmwN2cEVAJHupuehCuLdwG9BXtR3COrxDgaaylLhkA")

beads %>%
  arrange(desc(Red))

beads %>%
  ggplot(aes(Red)) +
  geom_bar()
```
